text: Scott Drury (born 1972) is an American politician. He is the Illinois state representative for the 58th district and a Democratic candidate for governor. The 58th district includes all or parts of Bannockburn, Deerfield, Glencoe, Highwood, Highland Park, Lake Bluff Lake Forest, Lincolnshire, Northbrook and North Chicago. He was a candidate in the Democratic Party primary for Governor of Illinois in the 2018 election. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Highland Park, Illinois
title: Scott Drury
